response.overview: There’s nothing in the rule book that says that if you build it, Clubber Lang can’t strike out The Whammer as a walk-on at Notre Dame! Wait, there is? That seems oddly specific… Hmm, it also says “It’s illegal for The Tasmanian Devil to end the Cold War by boxing Bagger Vance.” Who wrote this thing??  All these rules and many more will be broken in The Riffer’s Cup! Mike, Kevin, and Bill riffed moments from some of your favorite and not-so-favorite sports movies. We’ve got apes turning double plays, dogs hitting free throws, and Noltes throwing chairs. The whole experience is as chaotic as attending a Philadelphia Eagles game, except you’re less likely to get hit in the head with a D battery while a drunken fan eats horse poop.
response.title: RiffTrax: The Riffer's Cup
